issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I've noticed that Windows tests are timing out attempting to register Windows images. Default timeout for euca2ools is 30 seconds (I think). I've noticed that back to back attempts timeout so assuming this is taking minutes. After waiting for a few minutes and retrying I get an error saying the image name already exists so it looks like the original request does actually succeed. Thanks, -M {code} [root@b-01 ~]# source eucarc-10.111.1.1-eucalyptus-admin/eucarc && euca-register windows7winrm340imgtest1/windows7_winrm_3_4_0.img.manifest.xml -n windows7_winrm_3_4_0img-1405122990X --kernel windows --platform windows euca-register: error (InvalidAMIName.Duplicate): AMI name windows7_winrm_3_4_0img-1405122990X is already in use by EMI emi-e115868f [root@b-01 ~]# source eucarc-10.111.1.1-eucalyptus-admin/eucarc && euca-register windows7winrm340imgtest1/windows7_winrm_3_4_0.img.manifest.xml -n windows7_winrm_3_4_0img-1405122990X2 --kernel windows --platform windows euca-register: error: HTTPConnectionPool(host='compute.b-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com', port=8773): Request timed out. (timeout=30) [root@b-01 ~]# source eucarc-10.111.1.1-eucalyptus-admin/eucarc && euca-register windows7winrm340imgtest1/windows7_winrm_3_4_0.img.manifest.xml -n windows7_winrm_3_4_0img-1405122990X3 fields.summary: Registering large images taking over 30 seconds to respond
fields.environment:
{code}

GIT_REPO	git+ssh://repo-euca@git.eucalyptus-systems.com/internal#maint/4.0/testing
GIT_HASH	24c7196f8bfa1ba77a0de8130034874f1f954608

10.111.1.1	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[CLC WS OSG UI]
10.111.1.40	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[CC00 SC00]
10.111.1.41	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[NC00]
10.111.5.59	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[NC00]
10.111.5.60	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[CC01 SC01]
10.111.5.69	VMWARE	ESXI-5.1	64	REPO	[NC01]
{code}

comments.body: Checking the manifest has to be synchronous, but checks for the remainder of the bundle can happen after returning.  IIRC, EC2 doesn't even bother checking bundle parts until runtime.
The issue was that Java String's replaceAll takes couple minutes for a very long manifest.

[root@a-21 windows2012_winrm_img]# time euca-register eutester_installed/windows2012_winrm.img.manifest.xml -n winregtest2 --platform  windows 
IMAGE	emi-03f5f50b

real	0m1.237s
user	0m0.137s
sys	0m0.039s

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.2
Release     : 0.0.22276.64.20141002git039b884.el6
